opis: Transform your workspace into a soundstage with rich hi-fi audio. These super compact speakers deliver a surprisingly expansive and precise sound all while keeping your desk effortlessly stylish with their minimalist design. With their small size, they’ll fit snuggly into almost any setup. Equipped with Bluetooth, optical, and USB-C, STUDIE 3 is a true plug-and-play solution that ensures a hassle-free connection with both PC and Mac.

specifikacije.Inputs audio: USB-C Optical Digital Analogue RCA
specifikacije.Additional Features: Auto power up on all inputs and auto switch inputs Noise-free design (S/N 105 dB) Right/left setup and bass/treble fine-tuning via rear buttons Three predefined sound profiles (music, film, neutral)

opis:
SA1 MK2 is a powerful amplifier that punches way above its size. Get ready to be amazed by an unprecedented performance no matter which speakers you connect it to.

The insides are made of high-quality components and the outside is cut in a beautiful modern Scandinavian design. Stream your favorite beats with high-end Bluetooth aptX HD or plug it into your TV with HDMI ARC for a hassle-free audio upgrade!

This model is also available with Wi-Fi streaming. Check out the SA2.

specifikacije.Power (RMS): 2 x 100 W (4 Ohm) 2 x 50 W (8 Ohm)
specifikacije.Inputs audio: HDMI/ARC Optical Digital Analogue RCA Turntable (MM)
specifikacije.Additional Features: Auto power up on all inputs except phono Auto switch inputs

opis:
The SA2 is a punchy streaming amplifier that will light up just about any speakers you choose to connect it with. Building on the success of our beloved SA1, the SA2 has been upgraded with Wi-Fi streaming for pure, high-quality sound and greater convenience. It supports AirPlay 2, Chromecast, Spotify Connect, and DTS Play-Fi. Like the SA1 MK2, it also features HDMI ARC for easy TV audio connection, along with a dedicated turntable input and much more. In short: the SA2 supports virtually any device and streaming service natively.

For those seeking a cost-effective choice without Wi-Fi streaming. Check out SA1 MK2.

specifikacije.Power (RMS): 2 x 100 W (4 Ohm) 2 x 50 W (8 Ohm)
specifikacije.Wireless connectivity: Bluetooth Apple Airplay 2 Google Cast Spotify Connect DTS Play-Fi
specifikacije.Inputs audio: HDMI/ARC Optical Digital Analogue RCA Turntable (MM)
specifikacije.Additional Features: Auto power up on all inputs except phono Auto switch inputs

opis: SOLO is an easy-to-use network streamer built with audiophile components. Upgrade any amplifier or active speaker to a true powerhouse of streaming. Packed with AirPlay2, Chromecast, Spotify Connect, Bluetooth, and Roon Ready. Featuring analog, optical, and coaxial outputs, it easily connects to a wide range of devices. SOLO is the ultimate all-in-one streamer for your audio needs!

specifikacije.Wireless connectivity: Apple Airplay 2 Bluetooth Google Cast Spotify Connect Roon Ready
specifikacije.Streaming processor: Dual Core ARM Cortex A7 CPU
specifikacije.Outputs: Stereo line-out (analog RCA) Optical digital Coaxial

opis: Stream your music with ease. The Argon Audio STREAM 2 MK3 delivers Spotify Connect and Internet Radio streaming in one simple device. Effortlessly upgrade your audio system with this, user-friendly music streamer and enjoy quality sound that will make your body move with joy.

specifikacije.Included in the box: Power supply Remote control Batteries RCA-Cable

opis: Unleash the full potential of your music system with the Argon Audio STREAM 3 MK2, featuring Spotify Connect, Bluetooth 5.1 with aptX HD, Internet Radio, FM, and DAB/DAB+. Effortlessly upgrade your audio system with this feature-packed device and let the quality sound elevate your listening pleasure.

specifikacije.Audio formats: FLAC AAC MP3 M4A PCM WAV AIFF AU WMA
specifikacije.Included in the box: Remote Control Batteries Power Supply RCA-Cable Antenna Cable

opis: Enhance your music experience with the ultimate sound duo. Despite their compact size, the FORUS 4 speakers deliver a powerful punch. Paired with our SA1 MK2 amplifier, you get a complete sound system that lets you stream your favorite songs wirelessly via Bluetooth and let the good vibes flow. Quality, compactness, and eye-catching design – all at an affordable price!
Basic HDMI is an affordable high-speed HDMI cable that supports a wide range of digital sound and image tasks, including 4K@60Hz.
The Classic RCA cable is highly flexible, easy to use, and features gold-plated connectors for long-lasting performance.
The Classic Optical cable offers excellent build quality for noise-free digital signal transmission.

The Classic SUB is an ultra-compact subwoofer cable, just 2.6 mm thick. Despite its slim design, we have made no compromises on quality. Use this cable if your amplifier or active speakers have a sub-out connection.

For optimal performance, we recommend pairing it with our Y-SPLIT cable when connecting the FORTE sub-out to the L/R line-in on the MALMÖ sub, especially if you're encountering weak signal issues. We've bundled everything you need into one convenient package: the FORTE SUBWOOFER CONNECT KIT.

Preserve the longevity of your vinyl collection and safeguard your turntable needle with our expertly designed maintenance kit—an essential for any vinyl enthusiast. Essentials TT Vinyl Kit 10 provides all the tools you need to care for your records and ensure premium sound quality.

Included in the box: Brush 1, Brush Stylus 1, Record Clean, Stylus Clean.

specifikacije.Additional Features: Stylus Cleaner ingredients: Water 90.1%, Isopropanol 9.7%, DMDMH 0.2%
specifikacije.Included in the box: Brush 1 Brush Stylus 1 Record Clean Stylus Clean

opis:
Protect and prolong the life of your vinyl collection and turntable needle with our premium maintenance tools. Essentials TT Vinyl Kit 20 is the ultimate solution for keeping your records pristine and your sound crystal-clear.

Included in the box: Brush 2, Brush Stylus 1, Leather Mat.

Take your vinyl care to the next level with our premium accessory set. Essentials TT Vinyl Kit 30 combines advanced tools to ensure your records stay flawless, your turntable performs at its peak, and your sound quality is unmatched.

Included in the box: Stabilizer 330, Brush 3, Brush Stylus 3, Stylus Gauge, Protractor.

specifikacije.Included in the box: Stabilizer 330 Brush 3 Brush Stylus 3 Stylus Gauge Protractor

opis: These represent our newest stab at designing the perfect speaker stands. Modern yet timeless, elegant, and with a clear Scandinavian twist, these speaker stands are solidly constructed in black powder-coated steel. Either make them stand out by using the included front piece in brushed silver aluminum or take it off to keep the speaker stands timeless in all-black. Either way, your speakers will be elevated in more ways than one.

specifikacije.Additional Features: The included adhesive pads have a very high and long-lasting adhesive power to secure your speakers as good as possible. Therefore, be extra careful if the speaker has to be removed from the bracket again, as it may affect the surface.

opis:
FENRIS A4 will surprise you with its huge sound for such a small speaker! With a compact and sleek Scandinavian design, it will fit seamlessly into smaller spaces and add a nice look to any room. Easy to set up — just plug and play. Simply the perfect everyday speakers.

Our FENRIS speakers stand unmatched in versatility and sound quality within their price range. Featuring Bluetooth 5.0, HDMI ARC for easy and convenient TV audio, turntable input, and much more. All of this in a pair of speakers that will give even much more expensive speakers a run for their money when it comes to sound quality.

specifikacije.Inputs audio: HDMI/ARC Optical Digital Analogue RCA Turntable (MM)

opis:
With a bigger enclosure and a larger woofer, the A5 will provide a deeper bass and louder sound profile. Great speakers for bigger rooms! Simply plug it into your system and let the raw sound blow you away.

Our FENRIS speakers stand unmatched in versatility and sound quality within their price range. Featuring Bluetooth 5.0, HDMI ARC for easy and convenient TV audio, turntable input, and much more. All of this in a pair of speakers that will give even much more expensive speakers a run for their money when it comes to sound quality.

opis:
Take everything that makes the FORTE-series so great, add a bigger enclosure and a slightly bigger bass driver; then you get the A5, and it doesn’t disappoint. Elegant and easy-to-use speakers, that will fill even larger rooms with a rich, powerful sound.

FORTE MK2 is the gold standard of active speakers. Featuring fully digital amplification with four separate channels for the tweeters and woofers, custom drivers with ultra-low distortion and all the connections you’d ever need, including HDMI ARC, the FORTE MK2 series delivers a crisp and rich sound you won't find anywhere else at this price.

This model is also available with Wi-Fi streaming. Check out the FORTE A5 WIFI.

FORTE A4 MK2 might be small but don’t be fooled; it’s still mighty. Constructed to deliver an impeccable sound quality, so you can experience every little detail. Perfect for audiophiles looking to upgrade their computer setups or discrete TV solutions.

FORTE MK2 is the gold standard of active speakers. Our FENRIS speakers stand unmatched in versatility and sound quality within their price range. Featuring Bluetooth 5.0, HDMI ARC for easy and convenient TV audio, turntable input, and much more. opis:
FORTE A5 WIFI comes with a larger enclosure and bigger bass driver, which gives you even more powerful sound, while maintaining the pristine FORTE audio quality. An elegant plug-and-play solution that will fill even larger rooms with a full-bodied sound.

In FORTE WIFI, we’ve made serious upgrades and taken great sound to the next level. The sound of these speakers is just as crisp and rich as in the original, but with the added Wi-Fi connectivity, sound quality when you stream wirelessly from your device will reach new heights. Equipped with every connection you could want — Airplay2, Spotify Connect, Chromecast, and HDMI ARC — this set is the perfect choice for audiophiles seeking pristine sound and unrivaled convenience.

Please note: Natural wood finishes may vary slightly in colour and grain due to the natural characteristics of wood.

For those seeking a cost-effective choice without Wi-Fi streaming. Check out FORTE A5 MK2.

In FORTE WIFI, we’ve made serious upgrades and taken great sound to the next level. opis: Classic Scandinavian design meets high performance, all at a wallet-friendly price. Tailored to your lifestyle, this design marvel delivers a crisp, clear sound with a robust 4-inch woofer and smooth silk-dome tweeter, without taking over your living space. Pair it with our MALMÖ sub for a full-bodied audio experience.

Classic Scandinavian design meets high performance, all without breaking the bank. Experience audio finesse tailored to your lifestyle. These passive speakers make every tune sound clear and full, from the low thump of the bass to the clarity of the high notes, all because of a solid 5-inch woofer and a smooth-sounding silk-dome tweeter.

Dive into the heart of your movies and games with FORUS Center — the quintessential piece for your surround setup. With a super compact and elegant design, the center speaker of your FORUS home cinema matches with the rest of the series when it comes to sound, design, and price.

The FORUS 55 are the best-sounding speakers in the FORUS series. We’ve turned everything we liked about the FORUS series up to 11, delivering the ultimate performance in this price range. These floor-standers deliver deep, visceral beats that command you to crank it up and lose yourself in the music. For any music enthusiast, they're a true value proposition that beat the rest.

Sleek, flat-designed hi-fi that elevates your sound experience without thinning your wallet. Perfectly suited for wall mounting, this speaker is ready to deliver premium vibes. Just 10 cm deep, this is a compact and aesthetically pleasing passive speaker. It’s easy to install using a single screw and delivers wonderful sound despite its size.

specifikacije.Additional Features: Integrated Wall Mount (can be mounted both horizontally and vertically)

opis: The larger model in our wall mounted FORUS series delivers a more powerful punch and expansive soundstage with its larger woofer. Despite the increase in performance, it maintains a compact and stylish design for wall mounting. With the keyhole mount on the back, a single screw is all that's required for installation.

specifikacije.Additional Features: Integrated Wall Mount (can be mounted both horizontally and vertically)

opis: The MALMÖ SUB 6 is a compact subwoofer that will amaze you with its surprisingly precise and punchy bass. It might be small enough to discretely tuck away, but you’ll definitely know it’s there. Whether you’re an audiophile, movie buff, or gamer, your audio experience will be elevated noticeably. It’s the ideal choice for smaller rooms or apartments, where you don’t need the raw power of the larger subwoofers.

specifikacije.Inputs audio: Analogue RCA

opis: Get ready to rock your world with the MALMÖ SUB 8 Subwoofer, a great addition to any home audio setup that’s missing a subwoofer. Despite its small size, this elegant subwoofer promises to fill your room with deep, punchy bass that'll make your favorite tunes, movies, and games more exciting than ever before. The MALMÖ SUB 8 is the perfect companion for audiophiles and film fanatics who want to take their listening experience to a whole new level.

specifikacije.Inputs audio: Analogue RCA

opis: Prepare to be blown away by the MALMÖ SUB 10 Subwoofer. This epic subwoofer packs a punch with its power, precision, and style, delivering earth-shattering bass that will leave you and your friends dancing, gaming, and binge-watching all night long. The MALMÖ SUB 10 is perfect for audiophiles and thrill-seekers alike, ready to transform your space into the ultimate playground for music, movies, and gaming.

specifikacije.Inputs audio: Analogue RCA

opis: Phono1 is a high-quality phono (MM) pre-amp to put between your turntable and amplifier or speakers. And we mean high quality! If we had put it in a fancier box, we could probably have charged double, and it would still be called value-for-money, it's that good!

specifikacije.Inputs audio: Analogue RCA

opis:
The TT MK2 is the ultimate value-for-money turntable, delivering an exceptional plug-and-play experience with effortless usability, superb design, and sound quality that rivals models three times its cost. With a built-in RIAA preamp, it’s effortlessly compatible with any amplifier or active speakers, making it the perfect entry point into the world of vinyl.

Please note: Natural wood finishes may vary slightly in colour and grain due to the natural characteristics of wood.

specifikacije.Additional Features: Easy speed adjustment through the bottom
specifikacije.Included in the box: Power Supply (1.8 m) RCA Cable (1.5 m) Dust cover

opis: Our TT-3 record player is the record player you want. It’s easy to connect to your speakers or amp and with its classy design, it will instantly bump your cultural status up a class or two.

specifikacije.Included in the box: Power Supply (1.5 m) RCA Cable (1.0 m) Dust cover

opis:
TT-3 PLUS is the perfect mix of hi-fi performance and sleek, modern design – all at an exceptional value. Equipped with a factory-fitted Ortofon 2M Red pickup, it delivers impressive sound quality right out of the box. The sturdy build and belt-driven motor ensure stability and long-lasting durability. Plus, with the built-in RIAA amplifier, setup is a breeze – just plug in your active speakers or amplifier, and you're ready to spin.

Please note: Natural wood finishes may vary slightly in colour and grain due to the natural characteristics of wood.

specifikacije.Included in the box: Power Supply (1.5 m) RCA Cable (1.0 m) Dust cover

opis:
Refining the EISA award-winning TT-4, the MK2 offers a stunning combination of fantastic sound and exceptional build quality. Its robust plinth and heavy, rubber-dampened aluminium platter set the foundation for exceptional performance. The specially designed carbon fibre tonearm and pre-fitted Ortofon 2M Blue cartridge provide the precision required for truly audiophile-grade sound. With its built-in high-quality RIAA preamp, the TT-4 MK2 is ready to plug into any amplifier or active speakers straight out of the box.

Please note: Natural wood finishes may vary slightly in colour and grain due to the natural characteristics of wood.

specifikacije.Included in the box: Power supply (1.5M) RCA cable (1.0M) Dust cover

opis: Celebrating our first ever EISA-award, we wanted to do something very special… So we took our award-winning TT-4 turntable and made it even better! We’ve improved upon almost all aspects of the turntable, from the platter to the internal wiring, and most importantly, the TT-4 Special Edition comes pre-fitted with the fantastic Ortofon 2M Bronze pickup. Get proper high-end analog sound, but still in a true Argon Audio plug-n-play package!

specifikacije.Included in the box: Power Supply (1.5 m) RCA Cable (1.0 m) Dust cover

opis: The TT Signature redefines analogue listening. Featuring a floating suspension system and a precision photo-sensor-controlled motor, the TT Signature ensures exceptional stability and audio clarity. The carbon fibre tonearm, enhanced with our groundbreaking ATS technology, comes pre-fitted with the renowned Ortofon 2M Black cartridge, ensuring detailed and accurate sound reproduction. Drawing inspiration from the golden age of hi-fi and infused with modern precision, the TT Signature is crafted for those who cherish the ritual of vinyl and the authenticity it brings to every note.

specifikacije.Additional Features: Floating suspension Motor with photo sensor Rubber damping ATS (Anisotropic Torsion Stabilizer)
specifikacije.Included in the box: Dust cover RCA cable (1.0M) Power supply (1.5M)

opis: Enjoy the quiet in the middle of the storm with these active noise-canceling wireless headphones. Sporting high-quality 40 mm dynamic drivers and a rock-solid Bluetooth 5.0 connection, Quiet Storm is sure to bring you hours and hours of great listening experiences – all while providing best-in-class comfort and battery capacity.

SOUL3 might just be the best budget pick in their category. We've stripped these headphones down to the core, crafting the ultimate product. No frills. Pure, superior sound and rock-solid wireless connection. Stay stylish while enjoying your favorite tunes with 25 hours of wireless audio and luxuriously soft ear pads for premium comfort.

specifikacije.Included in the box: Carrying Hardcase USB-C Cable (30 cm) Audio Cable (1 meter / 3.5 mm minijack)

opis: In need of earphones with superior sound, clean-cut design, and top-notch features, including Active Noise Cancellation (ANC), all at a surprisingly affordable price? We’ve got you covered! With 5 hours of playtime (with ANC active) and six built-in microphones to ensure crystal-clear call quality, these earphones are ready to face the hustle, the office, or even the chill couch time. From a gym session to a bike ride, trust the IE20 to defy dust, drizzle, and sweat.

specifikacije.Microphone technology: Six built-in microphones (three in each earpiece) with Bone Sensor technology
specifikacije.Additional Features: 6 built-in microphones (3 in each earpiece) Easy voice control activation (Siri and Google Assistant) Mono mode for single earbud use (e.g. for calls)
specifikacije.Included in the box: Charging case 20 cm USB-C charging cable Silicone tips in three different sizes

opis:
Longer speaker cables for the FORTE-series of speakers.
Designed for use with FORTE A4, FORTE A5 and FORTE A55.

Note: A 3 meter cable is included in the box, when purchasing a pair of FORTE A4 or A5 speakers, while a 5 meter cable is included with the FORTE A55
Classic MJIN is a durable, high-quality cable with extra-short, gold-plated plugs for compatibility with compact systems.

Longer speaker cables for the FENRIS-series of speakers.
Designed for use with FENRIS A4, FENRIS A5, and FENRIS A55.

Note: A 3-meter cable is included in the box, when purchasing a pair of FENRIS A4, A5, and FENRIS A55.

Divide or combine any line signal with this high-quality Classic Y-SPLIT cable. For example, combine the L/R inputs of your subwoofer with the mono output of your amplifier or active speakers to achieve a full signal. This can be particularly useful when using the FORTE Sub-out in combination with the L/R line-in on the MALMÖ sub, especially if you're experiencing weak signal issues.

Available in two configurations: 2M/1F and 2F/1M.
A discreet and highly functional speaker cable, its flat and compact design allows for easy storage, such as along the baseboard or under a carpet.
With solid construction and powerful conductors, this cable preserves the dynamics and details of the music. Its extra thickness also makes it ideal for long cable runs, such as in installations.
Elegant and flexible, this cable features single conductors that are silver-plated and braided in three layers around a PE tube. This construction ensures music is transferred with minimal loss.

Do you need a wired internet connection for your FORTE WIFI or SA2? Use this adapter to convert the USB port to an Ethernet port. Simply connect your Ethernet cable to the adapter for a reliable, 100% wired connection.
A versatile USB-C to USB-C cable that supports fast charging, high-speed data transfer, and 4K video. Perfect for connecting the STUDIE 3 to your computer.

This kit provides everything you need to connect your MALMÖ SUB to your FORTE active speakers. It includes our CLASSIC Subwoofer cable and a Y-splitter, allowing you to connect from the "sub out" on your speakers to the L/R inputs on your MALMÖ SUB. This setup delivers a slight volume boost for an enhanced audio experience and ensures proper auto on/off functionality.

Easily connect your subwoofer using this kit, which includes the CLASSIC SUB and a Y-SPLIT (2M / 1F) cable.

Everything you need to connect your MALMÖ SUB to FENRIS active speakers or the SA1 MK2/SA2 amplifier. Use the CLASSIC RCA cable to connect the L/R pre-out on your unit to the input on your subwoofer.

This kit includes our standard CLASSIC RCA cable.

With a minimalistic and truly unique design, these speaker stands make all other alternatives look dated and clumsy (except our own, of course). Lift your speakers to the optimal height for listening – in a very classy way. We think this elegant design, the perfect embodiment of the Scandinavian ‘less is more’ design philosophy, can fit in great with most other modern décor, too.

specifikacije.Included in the box: Adhesive Pads Velcro Strips to hide cables

opis: Discover the perfect blend of form and function with our sleek desktop speaker stands. Designed with Scandinavian elegance and built from durable black powder-coated steel, they ensure an optimal speaker angle to minimize tabletop sound reflections.

specifikacije.Additional Features: Powder coated steel Ability to hide cables in the main column

opis: Elegant wall bracket for compact speakers. With this wall bracket, you can mount your speakers directly on your wall, and the included adhesive pads ensure your speakers stay on the shelf. Turn the shelf to adjust the angle of your speaker horizontally. You can also change the look of the wall bracket by using the included front in brushed aluminum – a pretty nifty detail in our opinion! The design of this wall bracket matches our speaker stands STATIV 62.

Minimalistic and elegant wall bracket for compact speakers. With this wall bracket you can mount your speakers directly on your wall, and the included adhesive pads ensure your speakers stay on the shelf. The unique design matches our speaker stands STEL 57.

specifikacije.Additional Features: Powder Coated Steel The included adhesive pads have a very high and long-lasting adhesive power to secure your speakers as good as possible. Therefore, be extra careful if the speaker has to be removed from the bracket again, as it may affect the surface.

opis: Add the convenience of wireless connectivity to your hi-fi system. WIRELESS CONNECT allows you to easily connect your stereo or active speakers to a turntable or subwoofer without the need for long cables. This gives you the freedom to place your equipment in any location, without the hassle of managing cords. How clever!

specifikacije.Inputs audio: 3.5 mm Stereo Mini-jack
specifikacije.Additional Features: Wireless Range 15 meters Wi-Fi 2.4 GHz Latency 25.5 ms Frequency Range 5-24.000 Hz (±1.5 dB)

opis: Achieve optimal placement of compact speakers on a shelf or on a regular desk with these stands. Made to provide a suitable angle of the speaker in relation to your listening position, while avoiding much of the unwanted reflected sound from the tabletop.

specifikacije.Additional Features: Acoustic isolation Tilts speakers 9.4º up or down for optimal listening angle

opis: Experience rich and impactful audio with this powerful, space-saving stereo system. Our FENRIS A4 speakers deliver surprisingly big sound, with Bluetooth 5.0 and HDMI ARC for a plug-and-play TV experience or a seamless wireless sound setup. Paired with the MALMÖ SUB 8 to feel every explosion, car chase, and jump-scare, bringing both classics and new favorites to life, all at an affordable price. Forget soundbars — this setup will blow them away, without question!

Live out your turntable dream with the perfect entry-level setup. TT MK2 is the ultimate value-for-money turntable, delivering great sound and an exceptional plug-and-play experience. FENRIS A5 are powerful and convenient active speakers, that are sure to get you rocking within minutes. Together, they deliver a full-fledged hi-fi system that’s big on sound and low on cost.

This setup is for the vinyl connoisseurs. The TT-3 PLUS is a serious hi-fi turntable with a sturdy build, built-in RIAA, and a pre-fitted Ortofon 2M Red pickup, to give you an authentic, rich vinyl experience. Paired with the audiophile FORTE A5 active speakers, you get a beautiful symphony of precision and style. A full-bodied setup that satisfies both your keen ears and eyes.

The perfect compact sound duo. STUDIE 3 active speakers deliver expansive, clear audio while fitting seamlessly into any desk setup. Pair them with the super-compact MALMÖ SUB 6, which will amaze you with its precise and punchy bass. Together, you have a sound system that’s big on performance, small on space, and easy on your budget. Best of all, they’re plug-and-play, ready to deliver amazing sound right out of the box.
RADIO 1 might just be the best DAB+ radio available at this price. It certainly is one of the best looking, as every part has been drawn in modern, Danish design.

specifikacije.Inputs audio: Minijack/AUX

opis: RADIO2 might just be the best Bluetooth speaker with radio (DAB+ and FM) available at this price. It certainly is one of the best looking, as every part has been drawn in modern, Danish design.

opis: World-in-one radio with FM/DAB+, Internet Radio, Bluetooth and Spotify Connect. You name it, RADIO 2i MK2 has got it.
